It doesn’t matter if you are heading for a National Road Racing title or if you are taking your bike to the local race track. This cartridge kit will give you loads of performance, stable damping characteristics and fantastic comfort. The kit has a unique design with compression damping and the adjustment on the left leg and rebound damping and the adjustment on the right leg – so all adjustments are made at the top together with the spring preload.

Keep your Yamaha XMAX in pristine condition with the Console Protection, a set of hard-layer stickers that protect the console from scratches and add sporty style to your scooter.

Perfect for regular outdoor wear, the two-tone Paddock Blue Women’s Softshell Jacket offers style and comfort for the home or at the track. Made from a blend of polyester   and spandex that allows wide freedom of movement, this jacket features a full-length zip and three external pockets for ease of use. Embroidered Yamaha Racing branding and a back stripe graphic add extra premium feel.
Undercowling that enhances the performance look of your Yamaha
Stylish Fairing protector to prevent scratches on your cowling.

Ideated for the modern riders, to enable convenient locking & unlocking without the hassle of traditional keys. Simply have your unit smart key with you to ensure the side case is (un)locked whenever you walk by your vehicle.

Catalytic Converter to be used for different exhaust systems to fulfill EU4 regulations.

These Genuine Yamaha Rock Sliders let you explore further - and more easily. They add a super-tough layer of extra protection to the vehicle’s chassis and sides, so you can take on the roughest, most demanding trails with total confidence.
Electrical heated hand grips to replace the standard unit grips.

Lightweight and portable, the REVS Foldable Silicone Bottle is an easy-to-carry item for active days indoors or out. Made from 500ml capacity black silicone with white Yamaha branding, it features a stainless-steel lid to keep liquids contained and an aluminium carabiner for attaching to backpacks and belts.

Made for the newborn Yamaha fans to get comfy in, the Paddock Blue Baby Bodysuit is crafted from a super soft blend of cotton and elastane. A push button crotch and flexible neck opening make easy fitting and wear, with printed Yamaha Racing branding on the chest for instant recognition.
Offers more protection for feet and legs and provides better support during riding

Yamalube® 80W-90 Rear Axle Oil is a heavy duty, mineral-based transmission oil designed for drive shafts and hypoid gears in demanding working conditions.

Constructed from textile and leather with knuckle protection, the glove is waterproof and breathable with an adjustable short cuff for maximum safety and comfort.  Touch screen-sensitive material on the finger allows quick use of devices.

No holes to drill, no tools required, no scratching! Attaches to any clean, smooth, non-porous surface. Dash, console, or windshield mount. Fully adjustable 10,1cm x 20,3cm mirror.

The ultimate Travel gear for your TRACER 9 to hit the road in full functional style. The High screen, the Add-on Wide Screen and Heated Comfort Seat provide the extra comfort for those long endless roads. The Top Case gives you the perfect tool to take your belongings along with you on your endeavors combined with the stylish Side Cases of the TRACER 9 GT. Charge your phone easily with the USB Charger while you , keep an eye on your tire pressure with the Tire Pressure Monitoring tool. The pack also has a dedicated GPS stay to help you clamp your GPS securely. The Side Stand Extension gives your motorcycle more stability on any surface when parked, the Radiator Guard protects your radiator against those pesky stones and loose gravel that are in your trail, while the Engine guard gives protection against unintended falls. The LED Fog Lights increase visibility in bad weather conditions for optimal safety. While you enjoy your ride, we made sure your passenger is pampered as well. They will enjoy the comfort of the Passenger Comfort Seat and the Backrest.
Protection pads to protect both sides of the fuel tank.

Offering premium style and quality for cold weather riding, the multi-fabric Men’s Winter Gloves feature insulation layers and leather for warmth and protection in two-tone black and grey. Level 1 knuckle protection fits seamlessly for movement and safety, with waterproof layering for extra protection from the elements. Touchscreen material and Amara fabric allow smartphone use and visor cleaning. A perfect item for enjoying and controlling your tide in the cold.

An organic cotton/recycled polyester blend, it features a racing blue body with black sleeves, with a lined hood and long cuffs helping you stay warm. A striking light blue speed block design runs the width of the chest, arms and around the back for an encompassing look with nods to classic Yamaha Racing and the new Sport Heritage XSR range.
Extra strong and durable mirror.

The Fabio Quartararo Men’s T-Shirt is ideal to wear while you cheer on France’s first premier class World Champion from the grandstands or at home. 100% cotton in two-tone Paddock Blue and Black, the tee features the red ‘20’ logo from Fabio’s suit and M1 bike on the chest and back. Yamaha Racing and M1 logos are printed on the chest, right sleeve and back, highlighted by white piping that completes the official look of a comfortable and versatile tee.

Designed for mountain biking in tough conditions, the lightweight MTB Men’s Pants offer great comfort and breathability. Constructed from multiple panels in a strong but flexible nylon and elastane blend, the pants feature an adjustable waistband, zip pockets for essentials and a seamless seat area. Yamaha and Alpinestars branding complete this must-have MTB look.

Fuel your passion for paddling with the Yamaha Telescopic Paddle. Its adaptable design and effortless adjustment let you focus on the joy of the journey.

Effortlessly adjust your paddle length from 50 to 114 cm with a simple twist for optimal paddling in any situation. 
The lightweight design allows convenient storage under boat seats or in WaveRunner compartments thanks to the aluminium shaft that cleverly hides inside the blade. 
Built to last, the paddle features a corrosion-resistant aluminium shaft, a hassle-free locking mechanism, and a high-impact moulded blade and boat hook handle.

The High Screen and Add-On Wide Screen enhance wind protection, while the Heated Comfort Seat and Passenger Seat ensure a cozy ride. Stay informed with the TPMS and Tire Pressure Monitoring Kit. Protect your bike with the Radiator Guard, Explorer Engine Guard, and add visibility with the LED Fog Light Kit. Secure your gear with the Top Case Mounting Plate, Top Case, and Backrest. This pack combines premium features for a superior travel experience.

Ténéré 700 is built to take you off the beaten track and move you over to new horizons. The Explorer Pack contains the complete ensemble of accessories to support this journey of discovery. The aluminium side cases with 72L capacity ensure you have enough space to pack up and go at a moment's notice. To carry even extra luggage, the Explorer Pack features an easily mountable mono seat rack, with flat surface, that allows faster setting up of additional bags. With all that luggage, it's imperative to have good bike stability when parked and that's why the Explorer Pack is equipped with a center stand. For added protection, the pack also features a skid plate and an engine guard, so your Ténéré 700 can withstand those long-distance travels. Are you ready to make the next horizon yours?

A perfect item for relaxing and watching your favourite Yamaha racing stars in action.

The GYTR® Racing Kit Stage 2 FIA is additional to the GYTR Racing Kit Stage 1 (2HCRALLYKT01 / B5HRALLYKT01) and includes those items that are mandatory for the FIA European or World Cross-country cups. With both kits installed, the YXZ1000R complies fully with the FIA T4 requirements. The Stage 2 kit includes plug-and-play fuel cells, an automatic fire extinguisher system and an additional bulkhead section behind the seats.

Key to any race team member or fan’s wardrobe, the Paddock Blue Men’s Team Shorts offer excellent versatility and breathability in hot weather with a mix of polyester and spandex. The waist is adjustable via a buckle, with hip and cargo pockets and a single rear pocket for extra utility. Embroidered Yamaha branding in white creates a stand out look that’s at home everywhere.

Protect your WaveRunner or boat from bumps and scrapes with these high-quality fenders. Featuring 4 feet of rope for easy attachment, the fenders provide a safe and secure buffer when docked or alongside another vessel.

The Tricity is an embodiment of convenience, making commuting simple, easy and fun. With such high dose of practicality, the Urban pack is aimed at increasing the options for Customers to offer additional comfort and space through its various accessories. The high screen provides greater protection against wind, meaning your journeys will never be tiring or uncomfortable. To increase the storage space, we included the rear carrier and the new 34L top case, which also increases the style quotient of the Tricity. There’s no style without substance and  we have thought about the passenger’s comfort as well and hence we include the backrest pad for the top case. We wanted to provide an easy way for our customers to recharge their devices on the go, and hence have included the USB charging port. Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your Tricity.

name.en: Hard Cab Enclosure System Glass Rear Window

description.en: Yamaha is offering all the components of the Hard Cab Enclosure System separately for added customer convenience. Accessing the cargo area with ease is one of the key factors in the fully functional Wolverine X4. This glass rear window opens utilizing familiar gas struts like those of a SUV to hold the glass up while the window is open (window must be closed while in drive).The fully lockable window keeps your items secure from unwanted company. When paired with the Rear Cargo Box that maximizes rear cargo space, you get a truly versatile package ready to conquer the outdoors!

Rain and wind shouldn't stop you from activities, and neither should they affect your riding pleasure and comfort. We developed the Apron, which uses special welding technology, to keep you warm and dry, so you can be more comfortable and safe during harsh weather conditions.

To give you and your motorcycle that edge of the seat adrenaline rush, the Rally Pack offers some of the most exciting and sporty Yamaha Genuine Accessories. Giving you the freedom to change riding position dynamically, the rally seat increases the authentic rally look of your Ténéré 700. To make it also sound like a true rally machine, the Akrapovič slip-on gives a throaty-rich exhaust note. Taking your bike off road can push the drive-train to its edges, and this is why the chain guide, chain guard and radiator protector are there to safeguard important elements of your Ténéré 700. For a sharp and dynamic look, the Rally Pack also includes number plate holder, tank pad and LED blinkers. The Rally Pack is your ticket to the ultimate sideways drifting action!

Lightweight, breathable and comfortable thanks to its soft cotton and polyester blend, this polo is designed for regular active use at the track. Its knitted black collar also features a button closure. The chest, right arm and back feature printed Yamaha WorldSBK and sponsor logos to complete this team replica design.

With all that luggage, it's imperative to have good bike stability when parked and that's why the Explorer Pack is equipped with a center stand. For added protection, the pack also features a skid plate and an engine guard, so your Ténéré 700 can withstand those long-distance travels. Are you ready to make the next horizon yours?

name.en: GYTR Stage 2 - Ténéré World Raid Handling Kit

description.en: The Ténéré GYTR Handling Kit has been meticulously engineered to get your bike's chassis ready for rally. Featuring race-developed 48mm KYB closed cartridge forks with DLC coated tubes and increased stroke, alongside a GYTR triple clamp assembly and fully adjustable steering damper manufactured by Scotts Performance, this kit ensures superior stability and control over rough terrain. Paired with a Paioli shock absorber, GYTR rally wheels prepared by Haan Wheels, upgraded braking system with Brembo calipers and GYTR ECU for ABS system deletion, these enhancements improve the off-road capability of your Ténéré. Complete with a lightweight chain and sprocket set, new radiator assembly with oil cooler and GYTR radiator guard, as well as a high front fender, this kit equips you to conquer any off-road challenge with confidence and precision.

Commute and explore with comfort and protection in the Scooter Women’s Riding Jacket. Designed in a stylish two-tone grey combo, this fully waterproof jacket offers level 2 shoulder and elbow protection, a removable thermo lining and neoprene-lined collar for both peace of mind warmth in all weathers. A detachable hood offers comfort, with straps to adjust the arm fit. Ventilation on the arms and back keep you cool in warm weather. The jacket also pairs with Yamaha Scooter Riding Gloves for the complete urban mobility outfit.

The SP Connect™ Bar Clamp Mount Pro lets you mount your smartphone to your motorcycle in seconds. The Bar Clamp Mount Pro also has a swiveling and rotating head so your smartphone can always be positioned perfectly.

Class-leading looks and performance are standard on the MT-09, but now you can take it to the next level with the Sport Pack Pro Black, designed to make your bike stand out from the crowd even more. Together with the diamond-shaped bar end mirrors, black-tinted fly screen and a sleek licence plate holder, these carefully selected accessories enhance your bike’s sharp and sporty looks. The TTX GP is the latest shock absorber for hyper sport and sport bikes. It features the TTX twin tube technology and has been developed with the latest technology from Öhlins vast experiences in MotoGP. The compression and rebound damping adjustments are improved by a new adjustment needle with better guidance and different flow restriction behavior. It gives a more precise adjustment and constant function. The adjustment range is also wider and variations between shock absorbers are reduced. And improved chassis feedback as well as improved performance for the rider have been obtained. The new main piston gives the rider much better traction and feeling which means improved control. The TTX GP is further optimized and shares all other benefits with the TTX36 shock absorber.

Yamalube Cleaning Gel is an environmentally neutral, quick, and effective universal cleaner for cleaning motorbikes, Scooters, outboard engines, boats, etc. The optimized water-based formula is biodegradable and therefore environmentally friendly. 
Mode of use: Spray the entire vehicle with the "YAMALUBE Gel Cleaner", let it act for 5 minutes, then rinse it thoroughly with a strong jet of water. 
In case of extreme dirt (e.g., chain grease or encrusted oil) let it act for up to 30 minutes after application. Rinse it out until the foam stops coming out. If necessary, use a sponge.

name.en: Öhlins Cartridge Kit Race - NIX 22 USD

description.en: The Öhlins NIX 22 USD cartridge kit comes directly from experience gained in the World Supersport 300 championship. It doesn’t matter if you are heading for a World Championship title or if you are taking your bike to the local race track. This cartridge kit will give you loads of performance, stable damping characteristics and fantastic comfort. The kit has a unique NIX design with compression damping and pre-load adjustment on the left leg, rebound damping and pre-load adjustment on the right leg, while all adjustments are easily made at the top cap.

The slim and functional phone case protects your smartphone at all times and lets you mount it to a wide variety of mounts and various SP ConnectTM compatible devices. Securely mount your phone with its patented twist-to-lock mechanism.
Make your rides complete with the Rear Carrier. Take top cases, luggage and more wherever you travel.
Soft fender bag providing additional storage for your ATV.
EC/ECE type approved Titanium SLIP ON EXHAUST SYSTEM.
Easy to install Silencer Repack Kit ensures peak power delivery and minimizes noise output.
GYTR Rear Sprocket with 46T for 520 Chain conversion
Yamalube® Coolant -35C is a ready-to-use formula, with anti-freeze and anti-corrosion properties that make it ideal for motorcycle, scooter and ATV cooling systems.
Aluminium Skid Plate

name.en: Wall mounting set for side cases

description.en: Mount your cases on the wall of your garage or shed with this mounting set. Cases are easily mounted on the holders for when you don't need the cases on your motorcycle.
Upgrade rear suspension with stiffer springs to resist bottoming
Connector cable to easily plug in the optional USB converter on your unit.
Yamalube® Silicon Spray restores and refreshes all sun-bleached silicon, painted or unpainted parts, with extra protection for plastics.
This dark smoked short screen gives your Yamaha a sporty look.

Yamaha offers this technical, highly functional entry level riding jacket. The jacket has a fixed insulation layer and is waterproof. The design is subtle and refined, combining excellent technical specifications conbined with a comfortable fit.
Öhlins Cartridge FKA114

Specially designed roller protection for CP3 engines. This three point stable fixation slider will limit damage done to your engine during a low sider. The protection is made from machined anodised aluminium  and features a Yamaha logo for that styling finish.

name.en: Outboard Engine Vented Splash Cover (F115 and F130)

description.en: Designed to be fitted while using your engine, this cover provides the ultimate protection against scratches and UV rays. The tight fit allows on and off water usage. Perfect on the waves, perfect on the trailer.

name.en: Monster Energy® Yamaha MotoGP Team Replica Polo Men

description.en: A must-have items for race days, the Monster Energy® Yamaha MotoGP Team Men’s Replica Polo Shirt is a stylish item worn by the race ream around the world. 100% polyester in Racing Black and Blue and styled on the M1 bike, the shirt is printed with Yamaha Racing, Monster Energy® and sponsor logos, with camo print side panels for extra edge. A zip closure collar ensures a comfort fit.
Electrical heated hand grips to replace the standard unit grips

Yamalube® Fully Synthetic 15W50 4-Stroke Oil is the high-performance solution for 4-stroke sports, road and off-road motorcycles, scooters, ATVs and quads. Excellent all-round protection for separate and integrated gearboxes and wet clutches, even at extreme revs and temperatures.

Specially designed by Alpinestars to help MX riders of the future race in comfort, the MX Kid’s Jersey offers excellent freedom of movement and coverage. 100% polyester construction helps with moisture wicking and allows plenty of stretch, with a sport collar for ample head movement. Sublimated Yamaha and Alpinestars branding gives the kids a look they’ll love to race in.

name.en: Nothing but the Max T-Shirt Men

description.en: Focused on its central Nothing but the Max chest logo, the design of the Nothing but the Max t-shirt for men reflects the Sport Scooter lifestyle with high quality construction. A 50/50 blend of organic cotton and viscose ensure incredible comfort for everyday wear, available in two colours for wider choice. Yamaha branding on the left shoulder highlights its premium feel and scooter spirit.
Easy to install Silencer Repack Kit ensures peak power delivery and minimizes noise output.
